description: Related objects from other knowledge bases, such as ATT&CK, that are relevant to this behavior.
The malware objective objects associated with the behavior.
The contributors to the malware behavior.
The STIX identifier of the parent behavior object associated with the method.
The contributors to the malware method information.
When a rule detects a specific method, as opposed to a behavior more generally, this property specifies the method.
When a snippet exemplifies a specific method, as opposed to a behavior more generally, this property specifies the method
